item.title: Drawing Lines in Godot and Beyond!
item.description: Introduction This article’s purpose is to explain to beginners how to do vector graphics. I’ve covered here all I needed to know to truly understand what I was doing. So, I’ll go into detail about things that are basic to some people, but that are nonetheless necessary. If you feel like you’ve got your bases covered, you might want to check out Drawing Lines is Hard by Matt DesLauriers. It was the first article I found on the subject.
